overview: Loyal girlfriend Kayden Kross receives a disturbing call from her boyfriend's cell phone. Sounds of fierce fucking can be heard on the other line leading her to believe that her man, Manuel Ferrara, is cheating on her! Leaving roommate Lia Lor behind, Kayden heads out to confront Manuel. Instead, she runs into his roommate, Bill Bailey, who just filled Lily LaBeau's love cave with his rock hard man meat. Where is Manuel?
tagline: This woman was scorned. Now she's about to get screwed!
title: Booty Call
